about_the_game:
Explore an immersive open world, complete with a (somewhat) functioning medieval renaissance faire, invite your friends to join your adventure or battle for dominance, make some new friends and try to survive cooperatively in this crazy world, or maybe dive yourself into a battle royale and try to be the last one standing. Take up an arsenal of deadly magic spells and crafty genre-bending weapons, all in a third-person RPG designed from the ground-up to play well with casual players. Welcome to Festival!

  • Role-playing Game Set in a Renaissance Festival (and the modern-day surrounding city)
  • Third Person Immersion - Hundreds of weapons, spells, costumes and armor pieces
  • Class-Based Combat / Loot-Driven Adventure - Rich & detailed world full of cool collectable
  • Fully Voiced Characters - An ever-evolving story, written and voiced by me and my friends
  • Open World Exploration - Built so that you never run out of things to do, see, hear or find
  • Online Cooperative Play - Story & world exploration, dungeon crawling, boss raids, loot
  • Battle-Royal Online Multiplayer - Drop on in, find supplies, try to be the last one standing
  • Moba-inspired Online Multiplayer - Character-based and team-driven competitive mayhem
  • Designed for a controllers (with mouse + keyboard in mind too, don't worry nerds)




Welcome to a new online community based on love and kindness, a reflection of the best parts of the festival world. Featuring local and online co-op adventures, persistent character PvP “Chaos”, a MOBA inspired character-driven “Arena” mode, a “Hurricane Season” battle-royale survival mode that feels like a perfect fit for this world, and “Zombies” of course.



Welcome to a free-to-play game where we wont charge you real money to wear digital cloths! You can browse guilt-free among our park’s dozens of digital vendors, pawning their weapons, armor, costumes and all sorts of beautiful useless junk to assemble your perfect fantasy character and live out your dream. Drive downtown for a more up-scale shopping and dining experience; and if you need some extra spending cash, there’s no shortage of wacky locals looking to pay someone for help. **Each additional pack of downloadable content entitles the player to a new set of multiplayer maps, characters, weapons and armor pieces. Once additional items are unlocked, new weapons, armor and outfits will be added to new shops in the game and will be available for purchase via non-premium in-game currency (Fool's Gold)



Welcome to a world full of weapons to loot! Your outfit is only half the battle, there's still the "battle" part to take care of, you know? With a unique mix of cartoonish modern an medieval weaponry, you'll never run of new deadly combos to discover and trade with friends.



Welcome to a story about magic, and the people who try to understand that it's real. With dozens of spells, skills and abilities to combine when crafting your perfect hero, there's room to find the play style that fits you! Each playable online character comes loaded with a few unique spells and a special specific role they were born to fill. Find a favorite, find your role.



So welcome to Festival, you belong here. What started off as an attempt to simulate renaissance festivals has now grown into a digital love letter to all the characters I meet along the way. Some of my friends were even kind enough to lend their voices to bring to life this colorful cast of characters. Your journey begins here.

Meet Your New Festival Family

(each based on a tarot card, each playable online with their own role and set of abilities)

  • Player Character - The Fool (0)
    Any weapon/spells - Fully customizable, male or female, any class and race
  • “Holy Roller” - The Magician (1) -
    Staff [Healer - Holy Magic] - Our game's creator as a makeshift anti-hero
  • “High Priestess” - High Priestess (2) -
    Bow [DPS]- New friend who owns the magic book shop in town
  • “Violet Angel” - The Empress (3) -
    Staff [Burst Damage] - Holy’s ex-girlfriend who is still the heart of the group
  • “Weekend Warrior” - The Emperor (4) -
    Sword+Shield [Tank] - Sees himself as the confident leader of the group
  • “Psychedelic Monks” - The Hierophant (5) -
    Spear [Cleric] - Open minded and grounded, but way out there
  • “Shelly Cyborg” - the Lovers (6) -
    Laser Pistols [Sniper/Hunter] - Prototype AI who you set free, but really who rescued who?
  • “Chef Tony” - the Chariot (7) -
    Axe [Bruiser] - Local celebrity with a food truck full of ambition and mead
  • “Lady Herb” - Strength (8) -
    Bow [Healer/Burst] - Friend who sells you herbal medicines… and certain poisons
  • “Parkinglot Warlock” - The Hermit (9) -
    Staff [Ranged DPS] - Retired tech genius but now he lives in the woods
  • “Billy BBQ” - Wheel Of Fortune (10) -
    Guitar (as two hand axe) [Support/Tank] - My ‘Jimmy Buffett’-inspired alter-ego
  • “Bobby Baycon” - Justice (11) -
    Pistol [Bruiser] - Johnny Law… or I guess Bobby Law in this case
  • “Jolly Jones” - Hanged Man (12) -
    Pistol and One Hand Sword [Balanced] - Pirate creep with a heart of stolen gold
  • “Snow Queen” - Death (13) -
    Staff [Support - Ice Magic] - Delightfully macabre, somewhat standoffish, party animal
  • “Beach Bum” - Temperance (14) -
    Knives [Balanced] - Always down for an adventure, story teller, good guy
  • “Middle Manager” - The Devil (15) -
    Assault Rifles [Ranged DPS] - Works at the local startup and lives in the suburbs
  • “Pixie Princess” - The Tower (16) -
    Staff [Glass Cannon] - Lives in a complicated world that’s always falling apart
  • “Ned Tugent” - The Star (17) -
    Bow [Hunter] - A washed-up wild rockstar who has a ranch near the park
  • “Techno Wizard” - The Moon (18) -
    Staff [Ranged DPS - Electric Magic] - Local DJ who gets a little wild sometimes
  • “Fire Dancer” - The Sun (19) -
    Throwables [Assassin] - A deadly display of beautiful motion, start a fire in your heart
  • “Good Knight” - Judgment (20) -
    Sword + Shield [Tank] - Jousting show champion, method acting as the good guy
  • “Hula Girl” - The World (21) -
    Hoop [Support] - She’s the heart and soul of the festival. A self-realized fool

and many more on the way...

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon Violence/Warfare, Explicit Language, Drug and Alcohol Use, and among the absurdity there will be attempts to tell real adult stories involving adult situations

short_description: Festival is a role playing game that tells a story about the foolish games and roles we play. Set in a renaissance festival & surrounding modern city; Explore a fully-voiced uniquely-written open world, solve mysteries, battle creepies and loot your perfect new gear. Do you believe in magic?
